description: Latin assimulatus, past participle of assimulare, equivalent to assimilare. See assimilate.

verbs.description: assimulate (third-person singular simple present assimulates, present participle assimulating, simple past and past participle assimulated)

examples: So that small and little vital Principle of the Fear of God doth gradually and yet suddenly assimulate the actions of our life flowing from another Principle

entries.meaning: (obsolete) To feign; to counterfeit; to simulate.
